description: Demolition of 12-19 Surrey Street; erection of a 5/8 storey building comprising 1,133 sq metres floorspace (3 units) for either use class A1, A2 or A3 on ground and mezzanine floors fronting Surrey Street, 266 sq metres floorspace (4 units) for either use class A1, A2, A3, B1, D1 or D2 elsewhere on the ground floor with 75 flats above; provision of a landscaped area and erection of a replacement footbridge across Surrey Street.
